\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&,column sep=small]
	{X^{n+1}} \& {I^0 (B^{n+1})\oplus I^0(H^{n+1})\oplus I^0(B^{n+2})} \& {I^1 (B^{n+1})\oplus I^1(H^{n+1})\oplus I^1(B^{n+2})} \& \cdots \\
	{X^n} \& {I^0 (B^{n})\oplus I^0(H^{n})\oplus I^0(B^{n+1})} \& {I^1 (B^{n})\oplus I^1(H^{n})\oplus I^1(B^{n+1})} \& \cdots \\
	{X^{n-1}} \& {I^0 (B^{n-1})\oplus I^0(H^{n-1})\oplus I^0(B^{n})} \& {I^1 (B^{n-1})\oplus I^1(H^{n-1})\oplus I^1(B^{n})} \& \cdots
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{e_1p_3}", from=2-2, to=1-2]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{e_1p_3}", from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{e_1p_3}", from=3-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{e_1p_3}", from=3-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
